column1: #text=I waited too long to start working on my report that was due for my class .
#text=I was in a hurry , and had to get some research material for the assignment .
#text=Sadly , one of the requirements for this report was to have a couple citations from a book instead of other articles that can easily be found on the internet .
#text=After an hour of searching for my library card , I found it at last and head out .
#text=After I arrived I had to ask the librarian where they kept such books .
#text=It was a while since I have been in there .
#text=I carefully looked through the books that caught my eye and picked the book that I needed for my report .
#text=I walked up to the librarian , and borrowed the book .
#text=But not without paying an old book fee I had from a year ago .
#text=After I paid , I walked out with the book in hand ready to do some research .
